title.value: CONDITIONS FOR INDEXABILITY OF RESTLESS BANDITS AND AN O(K^3 ) ALGORITHM TO COMPUTE WHITTLE INDEX – CORRIGENDUM
title.justification: The exact title of the given paper.
title.quote: CONDITIONS FOR INDEXABILITY OF RESTLESS BANDITS AND AN O(K^3 ) ALGORITHM TO COMPUTE WHITTLE INDEX – CORRIGENDUM

extractions.description: This note provides corrections to a previously published paper by Akbarzadeh and Mahajan (2022), specifically addressing an error in the formula for obtaining the Whittle index and other minor typographical errors.

type.justification: The paper deals with theoretical corrections concerning formulas and typographical errors rather than empirical studies.
type.quote: This note corrects an error in the formula to obtain the Whittle index using the Sherman–Morrison formula in Akbarzadeh and Mahajan (2022).

name.justification: The paper focuses primarily on corrections regarding the Whittle index and conditions for indexability, areas that fall under combinatorial optimization.
name.quote: Keywords: Multi-armed bandits; restless bandits; Whittle index; indexability; stochastic scheduling; resource allocation

name.justification: The paper discusses stochastic scheduling and resource allocation, directly relating to stochastic processes.
name.quote: Keywords: Multi-armed bandits; restless bandits; Whittle index; indexability; stochastic scheduling; resource allocation

name.justification: The correction involves an algorithm for computing the Whittle index.
name.quote: Conditions for indexability of restless bandits and an O(K^3 ) algorithm to compute Whittle index
